Graphan Documentation

This is a documentation for COM-Interface of Graphan Module, which was developed by Alexey Sokirko in Dialing Project. The main purpose of the module is to divide the input text into words, sentences and paragraphs. The module also finds some types of person entities , file names etc. Unix users are encouraged to read this documentation because COM-functionality is just a small subset of the C++ interface.

Generated on Sat Jun 25 17:04:48 2005 for Graphan by 1.2.18
